full_summary:
**Tender Announcement - Mattresses**
==========================

**Solicitation Number:** 47419-230999/A
**Reference Number:** PW-__PR-776-81444
**Publication Date:** November 9, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** 14:00 ET, December 13, 2022
**Tender Status:** Expired

**Procurement Overview**
-------------------

The Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is seeking proposals from qualified suppliers for the supply of Queen and Double size mattresses to the Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA).

**Tender Description**
-------------------

The tender is conditionally limited to Canadian goods. If two or more compliant bids offer Canadian goods, other bids will not be considered. The firm quantity is 56 Queen Size Mattresses and 39 Double Size Mattresses.

**Technical Requirements**
-----------------------

The items must meet the technical requirements specified in Annex "B".

**Delivery**
------------

Items are to be delivered as soon as possible at 475 chemin grande-ligne, Rigaud, Qc, Canada, J0P 1P0.

**Canadian Content Policy**
-------------------------

This requirement is conditionally limited to Canadian goods. If two or more compliant bids offer Canadian goods, other bids will not be considered.

**Enquiries**
------------

To ensure a response before the bid closing date, all enquiries about this requirement must be submitted in writing and received by the Contracting Authority at least 7 calendar days prior to the bid closing date. Email: [Camille.Dorion@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:Camille.Dorion@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
